languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас не мигая. Затем его губы искривляются в болезненной гримасе.{/n} "Троном клянусь, {name}... почему ты до сих пор не предал{mf||а} {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеноса{/g} смерти? Сначала предательство. Теперь — убийство агента {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}. Чего ты ждешь — ножа в собственное сердце?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас не мигая. Затем его губы искривляются в болезненной гримасе.{/n} "Троном клянусь, {name}... почему ты до сих пор не предал{mf||а} {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеноса{/g} смерти? Сначала предательство. Теперь — убийство агента {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}. Чего ты ждешь — ножа в собственное сердце?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix stares at you without blinking. Then his mouth twists into a pained grimace.{/n} "By the Throne, {name}... why have you still not put the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} to death? First, treachery, and now the murder of an agent of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. What will it take for you to act — a knife in your own heart?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас не мигая. Затем его губы искривляются в болезненной гримасе.{/n} "Троном клянусь, {name}... почему ты до сих пор не предал{mf||а} {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеноса{/g} смерти? Сначала предательство. Теперь — убийство агента {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}. Чего ты ждешь — ножа в собственное сердце?"

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希盯着你，眼睛一眨不眨，脸上露出了痛苦的表情。{/n}“黄金王座在上，{name}……你为什么还没有把那个{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}处死？先是背叛，现在又谋害了{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的代理人。你究竟要怎么样才会采取行动？要等她把匕首插进你的心脏吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you without blinking. Then his mouth twists into a pained grimace.{/n} "By the Throne, {name}... why have you still not put the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} to death? First, treachery, and now the murder of an agent of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. What will it take for you to act — a knife in your own heart?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希盯着你，眼睛一眨不眨，脸上露出了痛苦的表情。{/n}“黄金王座在上，{name}……你为什么还没有把那个{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}处死？先是背叛，现在又谋害了{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的代理人。你究竟要怎么样才会采取行动？要等她把匕首插进你的心脏吗？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you without blinking. Then his mouth twists into a pained grimace.{/n} "By the Throne, ... why have you still not put the xenos to death? First, treachery, and now the murder of an agent of the Golden Throne. What will it take for you to act — a knife in your own heart?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te observa sin parpadear. Después sus labios se tuercen en una mueca crispada.{/n} «Por el Trono, {name}... ¿por qué no ha ejecutado aún a la {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}? Primero, traición, ahora, el asesinato de un agente del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}. ¿Qué necesita para actuar, un cuchillo en su propio corazón?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you without blinking. Then his mouth twists into a pained grimace.{/n} "By the Throne, {name}... why have you still not put the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} to death? First, treachery, and now the murder of an agent of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. What will it take for you to act — a knife in your own heart?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te observa sin parpadear. Después sus labios se tuercen en una mueca crispada.{/n} «Por el Trono, {name}... ¿por qué no ha ejecutado aún a la {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}? Primero, traición, ahora, el asesinato de un agente del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}. ¿Qué necesita para actuar, un cuchillo en su propio corazón?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは瞬きもせずにあなたを見つめる。そして口を歪めて苦しげな苦笑を浮かべた。{/n}「王座に誓って、{name}…なぜまだ{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}を処刑しないのだ？最初は裏切り、そして今度は{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}のエージェントの殺害だ。どうすればあなたは行動するのだ？己の心臓に刃を突き立てねばならんか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you without blinking. Then his mouth twists into a pained grimace.{/n} "By the Throne, {name}... why have you still not put the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} to death? First, treachery, and now the murder of an agent of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. What will it take for you to act — a knife in your own heart?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは瞬きもせずにあなたを見つめる。そして口を歪めて苦しげな苦笑を浮かべた。{/n}「王座に誓って、{name}…なぜまだ{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}を処刑しないのだ？最初は裏切り、そして今度は{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}のエージェントの殺害だ。どうすればあなたは行動するのだ？己の心臓に刃を突き立てねばならんか？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix starrt dich an, ohne zu blinzeln. Dann verformt sein Mund sich zu einer schmerzverzerrten Grimasse.{/n} "Beim Thron, {name}... warum habt Ihr die {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} noch immer nicht getötet? Erst Verrat, nun der Mord an einem Agenten des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g}. Was ist noch nötig, damit Ihr endlich handelt? Ein Messer in Eurem eigenen Herzen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you without blinking. Then his mouth twists into a pained grimace.{/n} "By the Throne, {name}... why have you still not put the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} to death? First, treachery, and now the murder of an agent of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. What will it take for you to act — a knife in your own heart?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix starrt dich an, ohne zu blinzeln. Dann verformt sein Mund sich zu einer schmerzverzerrten Grimasse.{/n} "Beim Thron, {name}... warum habt Ihr die {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} noch immer nicht getötet? Erst Verrat, nun der Mord an einem Agenten des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g}. Was ist noch nötig, damit Ihr endlich handelt? Ein Messer in Eurem eigenen Herzen?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pendant un instant, Heinrix se contente de vous regarder sans ciller, puis sa bouche se tord en une grimace de douleur.{/n} « Par le Trône, {name}... Pourquoi n'avez-vous toujours pas fait exécuter cette {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} ? D'abord, la trahison et maintenant, le meurtre d'un agent du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}. Qu'attendez-vous pour agir ? Qu'elle vous plante un couteau dans le cœur ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you without blinking. Then his mouth twists into a pained grimace.{/n} "By the Throne, {name}... why have you still not put the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} to death? First, treachery, and now the murder of an agent of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. What will it take for you to act — a knife in your own heart?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pendant un instant, Heinrix se contente de vous regarder sans ciller, puis sa bouche se tord en une grimace de douleur.{/n} « Par le Trône, {name}... Pourquoi n'avez-vous toujours pas fait exécuter cette {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} ? D'abord, la trahison et maintenant, le meurtre d'un agent du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}. Qu'attendez-vous pour agir ? Qu'elle vous plante un couteau dans le cœur ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, gözünü kırpmadan sana bakıyor. Sonra ağzını çarpıtıyor.{/n} "Taht aşkına {name}! O {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenoyu{/g} hâlâ ne diye öldürmüyorsun? Önce ihanet eder, şimdi de {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht'ın{/g} hizmetkârını katleder ha. Daha ne duruyorsun... O bıçak illa kalbine mi saplansın?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you without blinking. Then his mouth twists into a pained grimace.{/n} "By the Throne, {name}... why have you still not put the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} to death? First, treachery, and now the murder of an agent of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. What will it take for you to act — a knife in your own heart?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, gözünü kırpmadan sana bakıyor. Sonra ağzını çarpıtıyor.{/n} "Taht aşkına {name}! O {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenoyu{/g} daha niye öldürmüyorsun? Önce ihanet eder, şimdi de {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g}'ın hizmetkârını katleder ha. Daha ne duruyorsun... O bıçak illa kalbine mi saplansın?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
